channel.title: Is there a way to run the patcher without the physical Axoloti hardware?
channel.description: While I'm waiting for my board to ship, I want to get the hang of using the software. But the software requires that the Axoloti be plugged in. Is there a way to test patches without it?

item.title: Is there a way to run the patcher without the physical Axoloti hardware?
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

TheDasMan:

Is there a way to test patches without it?

You need the board for Axoloti to work. You can play around with the editor but you won't get any sound out of it.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a way to run the patcher without the physical Axoloti hardware?
